css: body { font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.6; color: #333; }
h1 { font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; color: #2c3e50; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 2px solid #3498db; padding-bottom: 5px; }
h2 { font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; color: #34495e; margin-top: 18px; margin-bottom: 8px; }
h3 { font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; color: #7f8c8d; margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: 6px; }
h4 { font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; color: #95a5a6; margin-top: 12px; margin-bottom: 5px; }
code { font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; background-color: #f8f9fa; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 3px; font-size: 11px; }
pre { background-color: #f8f9fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; border-left: 4px solid #3498db; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; }
th, td { border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 8px 12px; text-align: left; }
